attributes.action: Make uber pay their drivers for loss of earnings due to covid-19
attributes.additional_details: Uber and other big companies like uber making billions.in a statement uber's CEO said they have enough cash to survive during covid-19 crises but they not  helping their drivers and delivery drivers at all.they didn't reduce their commission they didn't give drivers any financial help and didn't even provide drivers any protective equipment.
attributes.background: Govt should make them pay for loss of income to their drivers and delivery drivers in current situation of covid-19 or in any case of national disaster.if they don't govt should not let them operate in uk .

rejection.details:
Ongoing support for workers by individual companies is a matter for those companies, not the Government or Parliament.

We have published a petition calling on the Government to pay self-employed workers a wage due to lack or earnings caused by COVID-19, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303345

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
